Name Tutor/Concept/Description

Synopsis Gives a concise explanation of the concept.
Syntax Description: MarkedText
Examples The Description section of this concept page reads as follows:

Description: The Description` section gives a concise explanation of the concept.
Pitfalls
  • Avoid giving examples in the Description section but reserve these for the Examples section.
  • Do not give explicit lists of subconcepts (details) since they are already included automatically in the Details section in the HTML page.
